result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Clerk: Amanda.

INCLUDES: 18CF817, 18CF1068, 19CF149, 19CF608, 20CF960, 21CF253, 21CF723, 22CF472 and 22CF1002. 

State of Wisconsin appears by ADA Kyle Mayo. Defendant appears from MCJ, and with Attorney Brian Van Ells. 

Date and Time set for Jury Status Hearing.  VRCW. 

Parties wish to proceed with Plea/Sentencing today. 

Preliminary Hearing needs to be held in 22CF472 and 22CF1002:
Waiver of Prelims to be filed.  
Court questions Defendant as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information to be E-filed.  R/W; R/J.

PLEA to:

Ct.2>>NO CONTEST.

21CF723 --

Ct.4>>NO CONTEST.

22CF1002 --
Ct.1>>NO CONTEST.

COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding; 
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & voluntary made, a factual basis & defendant guilty;

COURT ORDERS: 
All felony counts >>SWH for 5 years probation, to run CONCURRENT to each other; CONDITIONS: Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent. Maintain absolute sobriety from controlled substances. AODA and follow through.  No contact with Toy Box Storage.  No possession or involvement of/with scrap metal.  Pay CC/DNA surcharge and provide sample. 

All misdemeanor counts >>SWH for 1 years  probation, to run CONCURRENT to each other; CONDITIONS: Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent. Maintain absolute sobriety from controlled substances. AODA and follow through.  No contact with Toy Box Storage.  No possession or involvement of/with scrap metal.  Pay CC/DNA surcharge and provide sample. 

COURT grants 92 days credit in 21CF253 and 21CF723. 
COURT grants 19 days credit in 22CF1002.  

Adj: 9:31 am.
